statements: SELECT * FROM student_enrollment ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT student_name, course_name, progress_percent FROM student_enrollment WHERE progress_percent > 75;
SELECT course_name, student_name FROM student_enrollment WHERE enrollment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT student_id, student_name, course_name, progress_percent FROM student_enrollment WHERE course_id = 101;
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM student_enrollment ORDER BY progress_percent ASC, enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM student_enrollment WHERE course_id = 1 ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, course_name, enrollment_date FROM student_enrollment WHERE progress_percent > 80;
SELECT student_id, student_name, course_id, course_name, enrollment_date, progress_percent FROM student_enrollment WHERE student_id = 5;
SELECT student_name, course_name, enrollment_date FROM student_enrollment WHERE enrollment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT student_name, course_name, progress_percent FROM student_enrollment WHERE course_name LIKE '%Math%';
SELECT * FROM enrollment_details;
SELECT student_id, enrollment_date FROM enrollment_details WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_id, student_id, progress FROM course_progress ORDER BY student_id ASC;
SELECT course_id, student_id FROM course_progress WHERE progress > 50 ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT student_id, COUNT(*) AS total_courses FROM enrollment_details GROUP BY student_id HAVING total_courses > 1;
SELECT * FROM enrollment_details WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_id, course_id FROM enrollment_details ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT course_id, progress FROM course_progress WHERE progress > 50;
SELECT student_id, course_id, enrollment_date FROM enrollment_details INNER JOIN course_progress ON enrollment_details.student_id = course_progress.student_id;
SELECT course_id, student_id, progress FROM course_progress WHERE student_id IN (SELECT student_id FROM enrollment_details WHERE enrollment_date > '2023-01-01');
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM Students ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM Courses WHERE instructor_name IS NOT NULL;
SELECT student_id, course_id, progress_percentage FROM StudentProgress WHERE progress_percentage > 50;
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM Students JOIN Courses ON Students.student_id = StudentProgress.student_id AND Courses.course_id = StudentProgress.course_id;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM Students ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM Courses WHERE instructor_name IS NOT NULL;
SELECT student_name, course_name, progress_percentage FROM Students s JOIN StudentProgress sp ON s.student_id = sp.student_id JOIN Courses c ON sp.course_id = c.course_id;

SELECT student_name, course_name, progress_percentage FROM Students s JOIN StudentProgress sp ON s.student_id = sp.student_id JOIN Courses c ON sp.course_id = c.course_id WHERE progress_percentage > 50 ORDER BY student_name ASC, progress_percentage DESC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, instructor, credits FROM courses WHERE credits > 3;
SELECT student_id, course_id, enrollment_date FROM enrollment ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT student_id, course_id, progress_status FROM progress WHERE progress_status = 'In Progress';
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM students ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT course_name, instructor, credits FROM courses WHERE credits > 3 ORDER BY course_name ASC;

SELECT e.enrollment_date, s.first_name, s.last_name, c.course_name, p.progress_status FROM enrollment e JOIN students s ON e.student_id = s.student_id JOIN courses c ON e.course_id = c.course_id JOIN progress p ON p.student_id = s.student_id AND p.course_id = c.course_id WHERE p.grade >= 70 ORDER BY e.enrollment_date DESC;

SELECT s.first_name AS student_name, c.course_name, p.grade AS final_grade FROM students s JOIN progress p ON s.student_id = p.student_id JOIN courses c ON p.course_id = c.course_id WHERE p.progress_status = 'Completed' ORDER BY final_grade DESC, student_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, date_of_birth FROM Students WHERE date_of_birth < '2000-01-01';
SELECT course_name, course_duration FROM Courses WHERE course_duration > 10;
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM Students s JOIN StudentEnrollment e ON s.student_id = e.student_id JOIN Courses c ON e.course_id = c.course_id;

SELECT student_name, course_name, progress_status FROM Students s JOIN CourseProgress cp ON s.student_id = cp.student_id JOIN Courses c ON cp.course_id = c.course_id WHERE progress_status = 'Completed';
SELECT student_id, student_name, enrollment_date FROM StudentEnrollment ORDER BY student_name ASC, enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT Courses.course_name, Courses.course_duration, CourseProgress.progress_status FROM Courses INNER JOIN CourseProgress ON Courses.course_id = CourseProgress.course_id;

SELECT StudentEnrollment.student_name, Courses.course_name, CourseProgress.progress_status FROM StudentEnrollment INNER JOIN Courses ON StudentEnrollment.course_id = Courses.course_id INNER JOIN CourseProgress ON StudentEnrollment.student_id = CourseProgress.student_id;

SELECT Students.student_name, Students.date_of_birth, StudentEnrollment.enrollment_date, Courses.course_name, CourseProgress.progress_status FROM Students INNER JOIN StudentEnrollment ON Students.student_id = StudentEnrollment.student_id INNER JOIN Courses ON StudentEnrollment.course_id = Courses.course_id INNER JOIN CourseProgress ON Students.student_id = CourseProgress.student_id;

SELECT Courses.course_name, CourseInstructors.instructor_name, CourseInstructors.specialization FROM Courses INNER JOIN CourseInstructors ON Courses.course_id = CourseInstructors.course_id ORDER BY Courses.course_name ASC, CourseInstructors.specialization DESC;
